nodes.text: Lazu Lirona was a female smuggler who was active during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. Her former occupation was a track star on Gavriza, but she fell ill with pneumogray, which ended her career. Lirona started a courier business, but later turned to smuggling innocuous items affected by tariff or license restrictions. In 35 ABY, Lirona participated in the Battle of Exegol as part of the fleet the Millennium Falcon gathered from the Core Worlds. After the battle, she traveled to the Resistance base on the moon Ajan Kloss and joined their victory celebrations.
Lazu Lirona was portrayed by Charlotte Louise in the 2019 sequel trilogy film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
